meanings.sent1: The fox was tricksier than the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She became tricksier when trying to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tricksier behavior made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His tricksier smile hinted at his hidden agenda.
meanings.sent5: The tricksier plan was bound to backfire.

meanings.definition: More difficult to deal with or understand
meanings.sent1: The puzzles in the advanced level were tricksier than the beginner ones.
meanings.sent2: The new software update proved to be tricksier than expected.
meanings.sent3: Dealing with the tricksier customers required extra patience.
meanings.sent4: The tricksier math problem stumped even the brightest students.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the maze became even tricksier with each turn.
